name: Bubblez
overview: In the infinite universe there are worlds where life forms extremely dissimilar to those present on our planet have developed. In this game you play as a space explorer who has ventured into a distant, unknown region and here he found with extreme surprise some very hostile beings who immediately attacked him. You must defend against these attacks by hitting the monsters before they hit you or touch you. Both their projectiles and their very touch is lethal to your spaceship. It was not built for this! And the inhabitants of this curious bubble world are extremely resistant to your blows and for you it is necessary to hit them repeatedly to destroy them. You must get out of this world alive to warn the galaxy. Published in Italy as Zullez in Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - big 100 (1987) and Super C64 e C128 n.35 (giugno 1989).
